channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla, and Musk, in crosshairs as Trump-vs.-China trade war unfolds
U.S. unemployment rate edges up as economy generates more new jobs than forecast
Trump open to tariff negotiations, contradicting White House aides
item.description: Trump's tariff fallout starts with layoffs, price hikes and trade war tensions, driving a broad market sell-off.

item.title: Tech-stock-intensive Nasdaq is now testing bear-market territory — live updates
China tariff live updates: Trump blasts Beijing as 'PANICKED' while markets continue to drop
item.description: China retaliated against Trump's tariffs with its own 34% levy. U.S. markets dropped on the news.

item.title: U.S. stock market has lost $9.6 trillion in value since Inauguration Day
Dow industrials fall a further 1,055 points at Friday opening bell — follow live
South Korea's Constitutional Court upholds impeachment of President Yoon, ousting him from office
item.description: This starts a 60-day countdown where an election must be held to select the next president.

item.title: What Trump says he's trying to accomplish with tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump contends tariffs will pay for tax cuts, lower foreign trade barriers, revive U.S. factories, curb fentanyl and reduce the natio...

item.title: Trump tariffs are 'pure madness' and the European Union should not comply, former Italian PM says
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's so-called 'Liberation Day' trade tariffs are "madness, pure madness", according to former Italian Prime Minister Enrico ...
